Text.Page: The Valkyon Federation has mostly pulled out of the Island of Dawn, but a few unlucky folks are left behind, trying to clean up what little mess remains. They asked if you'd help them so they could speed up their exit, and you accepted.

I don't know why they sent you here. Honestly, it might have been a joke. That's what this place is now.

You may as well check in with Legate Lam now that you're here, though. You can help us wrap up.

Well, now that you're here, we may as well put you to work. We could use some help getting this place cleared out.

I could have told you from the start that the federation wasn't going to be able to hold it together. All that unity crap was just talk.

You ready to help us get out of here?
